message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,000.  I think this is a fair price considering the value it will bring.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $9,000?

I understand your position, Bob, but $9,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could meet you halfway at $10,000.  This offer reflects the product's worth while still being a good deal for you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $9,500? I think that's a fair compromise considering the product's value and my budget constraints.
